title: 2016 Lamar 20’ Tilt Dump Trailer
item_description:
2016 Lamar 20’ Tilt Dump Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2016
  • Make: Lamar
  • Model: Carrier
  • VIN: 5RVDL1422GP037861
  • License: 4PK5748
    • Expiration Date: 2/28/2026

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 20’
  • Overall Width: 107”
  • Overall Height: 51”
  • Deck Length: 177”
  • Deck Width: 8’
  • Width Between Fenders: 8’

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Empty Weight: 4020
  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Electric
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: ST235/80R16
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: Pintle Hitch

Note: Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
